attributes.action: order an inquiry into increases by fuel companies (gas and electricity) now that oil prices have dropped so dramatically to pre-increase prices, yet previous domestic prices haven't been restored
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As of today (2nd September)the daily oil price dipped to $105, far below its peak of $147 per barrel earlier. In fact, it's lower than before the last two huge price hikes by the energy companies. The Public deserves to know why they are keeping all this windfall money and continuing to accrue it.
